seodesc: Logs, Metrics, Traces and more in one platform.Streamline your operations with worry-free observability and simplify your observability setup in just 2 minutes. 140x lower storage cost than your existing observability tools

items.title: OpenObserve
items.desc: OpenObserve is a simple yet sophisticated log search, infrastructure monitoring and APM solution. It is a full fledged observability platform that can reduce your storage costs by ~140x compared to other solutions and requires much lower resource utilization resulting in much lower costs.

items.title: Logs, Metrics, Traces
items.desc: OpenObserve is an open source observability platform that allows you to monitor logs, metrics, and traces efficiently. OpenObserve stores data in s3/gcs/minio/zure blob to achieve low cost data storage (~140x lower storage cost than Elasticsearch). It's stateless nodes architecture allows for extremely easly scaling. The advanced GUI for logs, metrics and traces coupled with dashboards allows you to not manage multiple systems for a different kinds of observability data (Think prometheus for metrics, Elasticsearch for logs, Jaeger for traces, grafana for dashboards). It supports SQL as primary query language, which means you do not have to learn yet another query language. PromQL is also support for querying metrics data. Inbuilt alerting mechanism allows you to send alerts to any platform (slack, teams, etc.). It is built in rust for high performance and memory safety.

heroSection.subtitle: Observe front end, back end, databases, network and more

heroSection.tagline: Logs, Metrics, Traces and more in one platform
heroSection.title: Run it on your laptop, on-prem or in the cloud
heroSection.subtitle: Use object storage and stateless nodes for unlimited scale with zero maintenance

cardItems.title: The Only observability platform you will ever need
cardItems.subtitle: No need to mix and match multiple tools to get the job done

items.title: Functionality and features exceptionally designed to optimize efficiency and performance
items.desc: We have excellent supporting functions such as Search around logs, VRL (Vector Remap Language) functions.  The advanced embedded UI and API are top-notch, providing an excellent user experience. The software provides visibility into your application with metrics and traces and the ability to correlate them. We have customized Dashboards that provide you with advanced data analytics.

items.title: Affordable Pricing for Optimum Value
items.desc: We believe that one should not have to spend a fortune to run a piece of software, either in self-hosted mode or for the SaaS platform. OpenObserve has a distinct method of storing and organizing data that leads to a significant reduction in storage costs, ~140 times lower than other options. As a result, it is an economical solution for overseeing and managing observability.

items.title: 10x easier to operate
items.desc: Our software is designed to ensure that setting up and utilizing it is a straightforward and hassle-free experience for our users. You can install the self-hosted option or sign up for the SaaS platform in under two minutes. You can start ingesting data and observing the behavior of your applications without any major configuration.In addition, it supports hassle-free software upgrades, making it more convenient for users.

useCases.title: Logs, Metrics and Traces
useCases.subtitle: Accelerate your cloud operations with OpenObserve's Search, Observability, and Analysis platform

items.title: Logs
items.desc: The software provides an advanced embedded GUI for fast log searching with features like top 10, search around, SQL for query and custom VRL functions. It also has ingest and query time functions, making it suitable for both beginners and advanced users to build and run sophisticated queries.

items.title: Metrics
items.desc: The software offers long-term storage for Prometheus metrics in S3 with support for SQL and PromQL. Correlating logs and traces with metrics provides a comprehensive view of infrastructure, and high cardinality data storage offers a new level of functionality.

items.title: Traces with Opentelemetry
items.desc: Distributed tracing with opentelemetry provides a means to identify performance problems within a microservice as well across in a distributed architecture with precision. Traces enables pinpointing issues that would otherwise be difficult to detect.

useCases2.subtitle: Get more from your data with OpenObserve

items.title: Logs

features.title: OpenObserve Features
features.subtitle: Explore the transformative functionalities of OpenObserve and experience a new level of data observation

items.title: SQL based query language
items.desc: Utilize what you already know. Nothing new to learn here.

items.title: Alerts
items.desc: Provides scheduled and real-time alerts that allow users to promptly address critical issues and dispatch alerts to multiple platforms using templates, which improves system monitoring capabilities.

items.title: Dashboards
items.desc: Dashboards provide a comprehensive view of system behavior by presenting real-time data from logs, metrics, and traces in a visually appealing and efficient manner.

items.title: Data Storage in Obect Store
items.desc: Provides Storage functionality support in local Disk, s3, MinIO, GCS resulting in 140x lower storage cost.

items.title: Dynamic Schema Evolution
items.desc: Ingest any and all logs without worrying about schema changes.

items.title: Security
items.desc: Fine grained role based access control (RBAC) for users and teams.

items.title: Advanced GUI
items.desc: Provides a user-friendly and intuitive graphical user interface for easier navigation and use of the platform.

items.title: User defined Ingest & Query functions
items.desc: Offers efficient data analysis by transforming large datasets into valuable insights while enabling users to customize ingestion and querying functions using the Lua scripting language.

items.title: Localization
items.desc: Supports 10+ popular languages for the UI.
